name: Test06 - Verify Details Of Product Added To Cart
description: This test verifies the details of a product added to the cart

steps.name: business flow - sort products by price Lowest to Highest

parameters.name: element
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (6d4ef3225f7d9273f9e7f46b69bba348)] -> css selector: select[name='orderby']]

parameters.name: productPrice
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (6d4ef3225f7d9273f9e7f46b69bba348)] -> css selector: p[class='price']]

steps.name: business flow - choose quantity and add product to the cart

parameters.name: element
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (6d4ef3225f7d9273f9e7f46b69bba348)] -> relative: {root={tag name=input}, filters=[{args=[{css selector=*[name='add-to-cart']}, 50], kind=near}]}]

parameters.name: element
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (6d4ef3225f7d9273f9e7f46b69bba348)] -> relative: {root={tag name=input}, filters=[{args=[{css selector=*[name='add-to-cart']}, 50], kind=near}]}]

steps.name: business flow - get product subtotal price

parameters.name: rowElements
parameters.value: [[[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (6d4ef3225f7d9273f9e7f46b69bba348)] -> css selector: td[class='product-name']], [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (6d4ef3225f7d9273f9e7f46b69bba348)] -> css selector: td[class='product-price']], [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (6d4ef3225f7d9273f9e7f46b69bba348)] -> css selector: input[type='number']], [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (6d4ef3225f7d9273f9e7f46b69bba348)] -> css selector: td[class='product-subtotal']]]
